content: persinette is a character in an old french fairytale a girl with long tresses of golden hair raised and concealed in a tall tower by a fairy… perhaps you ve heard of her by another name > add any **2 patterns** to your cart to get **20% off** > add any **3 patterns** to your cart to get **30% off** **matching pattern available persinette drawstring cowl 1 ** immerse yourself in a world of fairytales and make a #persinettebeanie for the little princess in your life or take some time away from your responsibilities to have some fun whipping up this pattern just for yourself designed with a slightly slouchy fit easily customise your new beanie by flipping up the brim for a more fitted look however you style it it will remind you every time you wear it to let your hair down every once in a while **level of difficulty ** this is an *intermediate* pattern it assumes comfortable knowledge of common crochet stitches as well as some more specialised the herringbone stitch and a modified x-stitch however there are also full photo tutorials and explanations provided if you are an adventurous beginner then go for it i m always here to help if you need it **materials ** size 4 yarn see below for yardage 4 5mm us7-g+ and 5 5mm us i-9 crochet hooks yarn needle scissors pom optional stitch markers optional **yardage ** adult large 196yds / 180m / 3 9oz / 112g adult small / teen 176yds / 161m / 3 5oz / 100g child 142yds / 130m / 2 8oz / 80g toddler 115yds / 105m / 2 3oz / 65g baby 6-12 mos 87yds / 80m / 1 8oz / 48g **gauge worked flat ** 19 sts x 13 row = 4 10cm in ribbing st pattern half_double_crochet 3l finished measurements adult large to fit 22-24 / 56-61cm 20in / 51cm around 9in / 23cm tall adult small / teen to fit 20-22 / 51-56cm 18in / 46cm around 9in / 23cm tall
